name: Joy Climb
description:
Welcome to “Joy Climb”!

A hard-shell chameleon and his friend Chuck-Chuck will finally knock your knees off.

Chamy is skilled at using his long tongue, catching at the isles, stretching it and climbing up.
Chuck-Chuck can sway from side to side using his mass.
Having a shell-warrior armor, he protects himself and his friend from the damage when dalling down.

Take all your courage and spirit to join our “Joy Climb” challenge.

You must move upwards.
Higher!
To the Top!!!

But more often you fill fall down.
Lower.
To the Bottom!

What we have:
One hard-shell chameleon.
One very cute chicken.
One huge level.
Very hard climb.
Very easy fall.
Continuous stress.
Lots of fun and joy!!!
